fanbox-desc: A new way of creating and using userboxes, based on special pages
fanbox-categories-help: Categories help organize information on the site. To add multiple categories seperate them by commas.
fanbox-hash: # is an invalid character for the title.
fanbox-mustenter-left: You must enter either text or an image for the left side
fanbox-mustenter-right: You must enter text for the right side
fanbox-mustenter-right-or: You must enter text for the right side
fanbox-createfannotloggedin: You must log-in to create a userbox.
fanbox-instructions: Choose a title for the userbox, add text (or an image) and color to the left and right side and press create! It's that easy!
fanbox-leftsideimageinstructions: (instead of text, you can add an image to left side)
fanbox-userdoesnotexist: The user you are trying to view does not exist.
fanbox-woops: Woops, you took a wrong turn!
fanbox-addfan-exists: The title for your userbox already exists. Please choose another title for the userbox.
fanbox-remove-fanbox: Remove this box from your userpage?
fanbox-add-fanbox: Add this box to your userpage?
fanbox-add-fanbox-login: Want to add this to your userpage? [[Special:UserLogin|Login.]]
fanbox-successful-add: You have added this userbox to your userpage.
fanbox-successful-remove: You have removed this userbox from your userpage.
fanbox-users-with-fanbox-message: Other people interested in the same stuff
fanbox-top-list-is-empty: There are no top userboxes yet. [[Special:UserBoxes|Create a userbox!]]
apihelp-fanboxes-summary: Backend API for the FanBoxes extension
apihelp-fanboxes-param-addRemove: 1 to add a userbox to a user profile, 2 to delete it
apihelp-fanboxes-param-style: Class for the success div element
apihelp-fanboxes-param-title: Name of the page (in the userbox namespace) where you want to add or remove messages
